title: Startactics: Squadron builder
summary: X-Wing Miniature Game collection and squadron builder for Android!
description: Startactics is an squadron builder based in the cards you have.* Setup your collections: set the quantity of each expansions you have.* Build your squadrons using you cards* Free cloud saving!* Share your squads as a image JPG, plain text or HASH code (used to import them in-app).* All pilot cards and upgrade card images are included within the app* If you enjoy this project, help back it up in the "Back this project" menu. You contribution will help me to improve and add new features to the app :)Like my Facebook page for information about what's under development and future features. https://www.facebook.com/shinayserAbout permissions:The "Contact" permission is used to embed your name into the jpeg generated through the "Share > Image" feature. If you remove it (android 6+) the app will continue to work, don't worry =)-----------------------------------------Disclaimer:X-Wing: The Miniatures Game is a trademark of Fantasy Flight Games.Startactics is the work of a fan, and is not endorsed by Fantasy Flight Games, Lucasfilm Ltd. or Twentieth Century Fox and is intended for entertainment and information purposes only.For more information on X-Wing: The Miniatures Game please visit http://www.fantasyflightgames.com/.
descriptionHTML:
Startactics is an squadron builder based in the cards you have.

* Setup your collections: set the quantity of each expansions you have.
* Build your squadrons using you cards
* Free cloud saving!
* Share your squads as a image JPG, plain text or HASH code (used to import them in-app).
* All pilot cards and upgrade card images are included within the app
* If you enjoy this project, help back it up in the "Back this project" menu. You contribution will help me to improve and add new features to the app :)

Like my Facebook page for information about what's under development and future features.
https://www.facebook.com/shinayser

About permissions:
The "Contact" permission is used to embed your name into the jpeg generated through the "Share > Image" feature. If you remove it (android 6+) the app will continue to work, don't worry =)

-----------------------------------------
Disclaimer:
X-Wing: The Miniatures Game is a trademark of Fantasy Flight Games.
Startactics is the work of a fan, and is not endorsed by Fantasy Flight Games, Lucasfilm Ltd. or Twentieth Century Fox and is intended for entertainment and information purposes only.

For more information on X-Wing: The Miniatures Game please visit http://www.fantasyflightgames.com/.
comments: Hey there! Thank you for creating this app. I have nothing to say, that isn't mentioned in previous comments, and actually I think that most of the things said are already fixed, as I cannot see them. The only thing, and it's really a small one, that buggers me a bit, is Ezra on the Sheathipede. He is with pilot skill 5, but the app displays it as PS 3. Other than that, everything is absolutely awesome. Keep up the good work! Cheers!

Good little app, too many & big adds and I'm not spending Â£7 to remove them. Try a 99p level.  Edit to Response: Apologies did not meant to upset, your app is very good and I usually buy apps to remove adverts as they drain battery etc but the price is a little steep. Totally your prerogative to price how you see but this will limit your customer base as what kid/young adult has that kind of money to use when a pen and paper or other free app will suffice. Keep up the good work and you effort is appreciated, I only wish there was a more realistic minimum, see other apps mate not many are that steep... Rating increased to show support :-)

Would like to see a reference card tab please and thank you.  This is the best squad builder app for x wing. All the other ones don't come close. Would have actually paid a dollar or two for it. Would like to see the rest of the pilot cards for the tie silencer, and rest of the other new waves. Also an iPhone compatible... Definitely charge the iPhone users lol
I'm not sure if I like this app being collection-based because I like to build squads of ships I don't have, but I still think the interface is awesome.
Great App to track what units I have. Can also add cards to my collection that I was able to obtain from trades, ect.
Hands down, the best X-Wing Squad Builder on Android.  Cannot recommend highly enough.
